lines: 1. Dzunisani Hosi, Vanhu Misaveni, Tlangelani, Ku Rhandza Ka Yesu,
2. Bana Mhalamhala, Andzisa Ku Rhula, Hi Dzunisa, Tisani Swo Chaya,
Hi Cina, Hi Tsaka, Hi Ku Yimbelela, Aleluya.
3. Tshika Ku Vilela, Khongela Ka Yesu, Ku Pfuneta, Masiku Hinkwawo,
Wa Hi Amukela, A Hi N’wi Khenseni, Hi Masiku.
